name: SKReachConstraints
desc: A specification of the degree of freedom when solving inverse kinematics.

items.name: init(lowerAngleLimit: CGFloat, upperAngleLimit: CGFloat)
items.desc: Initializes a new reach constraint object.

items.name: var lowerAngleLimit: CGFloat
items.desc: The minimum angle that the node can have after it is rotated by a reach event.

items.name: var upperAngleLimit: CGFloat
items.desc: The maximum angle that the node can have after it is rotated by a reach event.
